# htw-berlin-side-menu

The side menu can wrap any number of htw-berlin-link elements.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description           | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `dark`   | `dark`    | use dark mode if true | `boolean` | `false` |
